title: However, such development should not be permitted on lands which deserve preservation or protection from Environmental considerations viz
clause_text: However, such development should not be permitted on lands which deserve preservation or protection from Environmental considerations viz. Hills and Hill tops and within the required Buffer Zone / Prohibited Zone from river, lakes and reservoirs of minor and major project of water resource department. (1)

source_pdf.filename: UDCPR Updated 30.01.25 with earlier provisions & corrections_compressed.docx
